page.title: 08HOME LIFE
page.content: My name is Rhian Evans.I go to Rhewl school and I have got many friends.My house is called Bryn Afon.I go to school by nine o'clock and we finish at half past three.My teachers name is Mr. Griffiths.He is the headmaster.We do reading,maths,English,Welsh and many other things.My favourite subject is gymnastics.My hobbies are dancing,collecting rubbers and collecting stamps.My favourite food is meat.I also like reading before I go to sleep.My favourite TV programme is Top Of The Pops,especially when Shakin' Stevens is on.I am ten years old and I will be eleven in January.My dad is a farmer on Rhyd-y-cilgwyn.My mum is a cleaner in the Grange and the Drovers Arms.I have got two sisters called Nia and Ellen.
